articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets IPU Secretary General
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets IPU Secretary General
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Martin Chungong, secretary general of the Inter-Parliamentary Union, and his party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Netherlands
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Netherlands
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Willem Alexander, king of Netherlands, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message wished the people of Netherlands well-being and prosperity.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from IPU Secretary General
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from IPU Secretary General
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Martin Chungong, secretary general of the Inter-Parliamentary Union, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The secretary general handed the gift over to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Thursday.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Plug S. Korea into MD System under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Plug S. Korea into MD System under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Thursday released a statement denouncing the U.S. for running the whole gamut of intrigues to plug south Korea into the U.S.-led missile defense system by deploying THAAD in south Korea under the pretext of "threat" from the DPRK. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities at a recent KIDD meeting confirmed an operation plan for deterring "threat from north's nukes and missiles" in the light of coordinated operation and agreed to operate the U.S.-south Korea "deterrence strategic committee." 
					
					 The U.S. is attempting to deploy THAAD in south Korea for the first time in the wake of its deployment on the mainland and Guam. This is related to the establishment of MD, an important part of the strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by the  U.S. in the projected deployment of  THAAD in south Korea under the pretence of "threat" from the DPRK is to forward-deploy high-performance radar in south Korea in order to rapidly monitor and chase the movements of missiles of the rivals in the Eurasian region. 
					
					 The U.S. deployment of THAAD in south Korea would result in unilaterally weakening or disabling the deterrent force of strategic forces of neighboring countries and, consequently, upsetting the existing deterrence balance between the U.S. and surrounding countries. This would spark off mistrust and friction between the surrounding countries and the U.S. and south Korea which allowed its deployment and would entail irretrievable baneful consequences and new danger to the security environment in the region.
					
					 The escalating tension in the region would make the south Korean puppet forces having the shackling "alliance" with the U.S. increasingly dependent on it. 
					
					 In the final analysis, through the deployment of THAAD the U.S. seeks to achieve its military purpose and, at the same time, strain the relations between south Korea and surrounding countries to put Seoul under its tighter control. 
					
					 The surrounding countries warn that deployment of THAAD in south Korea would go beyond the "red-line" and south Korea would become a target of nuclear attack from other countries. This fully reflects their concern and caution of other countries against THAAD. 
					
					 The deployment of THAAD in south Korea would further increase the danger of conflict among powers in Northeast Asia. This will compel the DPRK to bolster up its military capability to cope with it as the DPRK will be exposed to its threat.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman on Revised "U.S.-Japan Defense Cooperation Guidelines"
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman on Revised "U.S.-Japan Defense Cooperation Guidelines"
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic and military authorities of the United States and Japan held a security meeting on April 27 to revise the "U.S.-Japan defense cooperation guidelines".
					 In the new "guidelines" the U.S. set major five sectors for security cooperation with Japan ranging from "peace time" to "contingency", calling for such strengthened role of the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" (SDF) as ballistic missile interception, logistic support to the U.S. forces worldwide, guarantee of maritime security, search and mine sweeping, non-proliferation of WMDs, inspection of vessels and anti-terrorism operation.
					
					 After all the U.S. expanded to the whole world the sphere of SDF's activities, which had been limited to the vicinity of Japan, and made it possible to get military support from Japan during its military operation in any part of the world.
					
					 In this regard, a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued a statement on Thursday condemning the revised guidelines.
					
					 What cannot be overlooked is the fact that the U.S. pulled up the DPRK, contending that the revision was needed to "deter any provocative action" of the latter, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. asserted that the revised "guidelines" are to cope with "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 But it is the ulterior objective of the U.S. to lessen its heavy burden of military spending with the strengthened role of SDF, use Japan as a shock brigade for realizing its ambition for world supremacy, encircle and contain its rivals in Eurasia by force of arms and maintain its hegemonic position.
					
					 The U.S. has fanned up Japan's revival of militarism to attain its goal, in disregard of the world concern over the latter's attempt to embellish and deny the past history.
					
					 The strengthened U.S.-Japan military alliance will inevitably harass the stability of Northeast Asia, foment confrontation and friction in the region and spark off disputes and arms race.
					
					 No matter how the structure of relations among neighboring countries may change, the DPRK will invariably hold fast to the Songun politics and the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts and bolster up its capabilities for self-defense with the nuclear deterrent as a pivot unless the U.S. gives up its hostile policy aimed to stifle the former.

articles.title: DWUK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DWUK Delegation Back Home
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea led by Chae Chun Hui, vice-chairwoman of its Central Committee, returned home Thursday after participating in the meetings of the Women's International Democratic Federation held in El Salvador and visiting Mexico.

articles.title: IPU Secretary General Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
IPU Secretary General Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Martin Chungong, secretary general of the Inter-Parliamentary Union, and his party visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Thursday.
					 They went round historic relics preserved with care, being briefed on the career of the President who was born at the low-roofed thatched house in Mangyongdae and nurtured a noble intention to make revolution from his childhood.
					
					 They visited revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 At the end of the visit the secretary general said he was deeply moved to hear about the revolutionary family of the President. He went on:
					
					 The President's family struggled for the revolution generation after generation.
					
					 The experience gained by him in the revolutionary struggle serves as a precious example to be followed by progressive mankind.
					
					 The younger generation of the DPRK is adding brilliance to the feats of the President.
					
					 The guests also visited the International Friendship Exhibition House, Okryu Children's Hospital, Munsu Water Park, etc.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks May Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks May Day
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Central Hall of Workers Thursday to mark the 125th May Day.
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, Ro Tu Chol, officials of the party and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, working people in the city and overseas compatriots. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a report.
					
					 He said that May Day is a significant holiday fully demonstrating the revolutionary spirit and militant might of the working people of Songun Korea and boosting international solidarity with other people the world over.
					
					 As they were guided by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the working people in the DPRK could successfully fulfill their noble historic mission and duty in the efforts to accomplish the cause of the popular masses for independence and the socialist cause, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 From the very day the President embarked on the road of revolution in his early years, he put forward popular masses as the master of the revolution under the banner of the Juche idea and gave play to their inexhaustible efforts, ushering in a new era of history, Juche era in which a struggle is going on to achieve their independence.
					
					 Kim Jong Il rallied working people close around the Party and wisely led to victory their cause of independence and the socialist cause by dint of single-minded unity.
					
					 The history of the revolutionary leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is being steadily carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un reposes firm trust in the workers, farmers and intellectuals in the country who have shared destiny with the Party and remained faithful to it and has given fullest play to their inexhaustible mental power and patriotic enthusiasm. He is wisely leading the drive for implementing the last instructions of Kim Jong Il and the general offensive to build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The history of the Korean revolution is recorded with the heroic feats the working people have performed by devotedly working for the Party and revolution, country and its people with hammers, sickles and writing brushes, remaining true to the great leaders, the great Party's idea and leadership.
					
					 The reporter called for hastening the building a thriving socialist nation and the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games Close
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games Close
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games was closed with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Thursday. The games opened here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The April 25 Sports Team came first in group standings and the Sports Team under the Ministry of Land and Marine Transport and the Kigwancha Sports Team second and third. 
					
					 Men and women players of the April 25 Sports Team proved successful at the basketball games.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, officials concerned, officials in the field of sports, sportspersons and other people.

articles.title: National Calligraphy Festival in DPRK
articles.content:
National Calligraphy Festival in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- A national calligraphy festival took place at the Pyongyang International House of Culture on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (April 15).
					 On display at the festival were more than 250 pieces of calligraphic works written with diverse strokes.
					
					 In this regard, Ri Kyong Min, an official of the Ministry of Culture, told KCNA:
					
					 The festival brought together hundreds of applicants including three-year old children.
					
					 Presented to the festival were such calligraphic works dealing with the spirit of the times as "Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu", "Green Woods", "Gold Mountains", "Gold Sea" and "Hot Wind of Sports".
					
					 What caught visitors' eyes were calligraphic works written by three-, four- and five-year old children as well as amateurs.
					
					 Those children included Cha Wi Ju and Kim Jin Gon of the Ponbu Kindergarten in Sinuiju, who displayed calligraphic works "Magnolia" and "The Sun".
					
					 The festival made its visitors feel the advantages of the education system of the DPRK.

articles.title: Shizandra Yield to Be Increased in DPRK
articles.content:
Shizandra Yield to Be Increased in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Thremmatology Institute under the Academy of Forestry in the DPRK developed a new technology for increasing the yield of shizandra.
					 Shizandra, abundant in organic acids and various medicinal ingredients, has been widely used for treatment of different diseases and in food industry.
					
					 The institute has succeeded in cultivating high-yielding shizandra vine growing well even on the sunny land. The new technology is believed to be conducive to promoting health of the people and developing the food industry of the country.

articles.title: Pyongyang Koryo International Travel Company
articles.content:
Pyongyang Koryo International Travel Company
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Koryo International Travel Company, located in Central District, Pyongyang, enjoys popularity among tourists at home and abroad. 
					 The company, established in January this year, has more than ten branches in foreign countries, including Russia and the United Arab Emirates and branch offices in Hamhung and Wonsan cities in the country. 
					
					 It runs Pyongyang Koryo Hotel, Hyangsan Hotel, Masikryong Hotel, Myohyangsan Specialty Restaurant and Kaesong Koryo Service Agency, while giving sight-seeing bus services for tourist destinations, including Pyongyang-Masik Pass and Wonsan-Masik Pass.
					
					 Kang Chol Su, director of the company, told KCNA that his company would further invigorate tourism in close contact with Asian and European travel agencies.

articles.title: New Decoration Printing Process Established in DPRK
articles.content:
New Decoration Printing Process Established in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- A decoration printing process was established at the Songyo Ceramic Factory in Pyongyang by Pyongyang University of Printing.
					 This process makes it possible to increase the production of ceramic manufactures with diverse and graceful patterns.
					
					 Researchers of the university manufactured a lot of equipment and apparatuses needed for the process on their own efforts and succeeded in making butyraldehyde-urea plastic through development of local plastic film additives.
					
					 The DPRK has directed its efforts to putting the traditional ceramic production on an industrial basis.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. should roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and behave with discretion, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 The article notes:
					
					 The U.S. has ratcheted up its military threat and pressure upon the DPRK by further modernizing weaponry and military hardware of its troops in south Korea, intensifying military nexus with Japan and south Korea and frequently staging together with the south Korean puppet forces provocative war drills against the DPRK.
					
					 According to the contract the U.S. Department of Defense signed with the Lockheed Martin military business, the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea will be provided with THAAD.
					
					 The main purpose sought by the U.S. in THAAD deployment is to round off its preparations for a preemptive attack on the DPRK and create favorable conditions for containing powers in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The story about "threat from north's nukes and missiles" much touted by the U.S. is no more than a pretext to introduce such preemptive nuclear strike means as THAAD in south Korea and build a missile defense system in a bid to finally round off the preparations for a nuclear war and mount a preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK and its neighboring countries any moment.
					
					 The disgusting moves of the U.S. are the last-ditch efforts to block the DPRK winning victories.
					
					 It is just a daydream for the U.S. administration to trying to do harm to the DPRK, bereft of reason.
					
					 If a local war, a total war or a nuclear war breaks out due to arrogance and misjudgment of the White House, the DPRK will never miss the chance but lead it to a great war for the country's reunification and put a definite end to the U.S. history of aggression.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Driving Inter-Korean Relations into Catastrophe
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Driving Inter-Korean Relations into Catastrophe
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are so impudent as to bluster that "south-north relations would be improved" and vociferate about "dialogue" though they have driven the inter-Korean relations into the worst catastrophe by staging frantic war exercises against the north. And they are busying themselves working out a "scenario for south-north talks," crying out for "coping with full-dress south-north dialogue."
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean authorities' talk about "dialogue" is nothing but a shameless behavior of those who deteriorated the north-south relations. 
					
					 The puppet forces are talking about "dialogue" while pretending ignorance of their responsibility for bedeviling the north-south relations. This is not because they are sincerely interested in north-south dialogue and improved relations. This is a crafty artifice to evade the responsibility for creating the worst crisis on the Korean peninsula together with the U.S. and mislead public opinion at home and abroad critic of them and justify their joint military exercises against the north. 
					
					 Dialogue is necessary for improving the north-south relations as aspired by the nation for independent reunification but it is not a smokescreen to justify hostile acts toward the other party and persistently resort to the war moves against the north. 
					
					 Improvement of the north-south relations is a daydream as long as the south Korean puppet forces persist in the moves for confrontation and war against the north in league with outside forces.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Reckless Action of Japan to Cover up Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Reckless Action of Japan to Cover up Its Past Crimes
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- More crimes committed by Japan during its colonial rule over Korea have been disclosed recently, sparking off uproar of the international community. 
					 A historical document was recently found to testify to the fact that the commander of a Japanese army unit ordered an officer in charge of "comfort women" to carry out the forcible drafting of women.
					
					 A Japanese, who had served in unit 731 as a juvenile soldier during the Second World War, testified that experiments were conducted by Japanese imperialists on living bodies.
					
					 In this connection a social body consisting of Japanese doctors and scholars held a special event in demand of probe into the truth about the experiments and the opening of the related information.
					
					 Minju Joson on Thursday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This shows that no matter how much water may flow under the bridge and how desperately Japan may try to hide its past crimes, it can never cover up the historical truth.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists made no scruple of committing hideous crimes against humanity unprecedented in the history of mankind in Korea and the rest of Asia.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are painting their past military occupation of Korea and colonial rule over it as "just actions" for "protecting" it from European powers' invasion, while denying the forcible drafting of Koreans.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the Japanese reactionaries in deliberately denying and distorting history.
					
					 They seek to twist the historical facts unfavorable for carrying out the scenario for launching militarist overseas aggression to meet their requirements, to help Japan veer to the Right and train more ultra-right conservatives so as to realize the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" at any cost.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to respect history, admit its past crimes, and opt for making an apology and reparation for them, though belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Blast U.S.-Japan Military Tie-up
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Blast U.S.-Japan Military Tie-up
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the Society of April Revolution, the Solidarity for Progress, the Confederation of Trade Unions, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and other civic and social bodies of south Korea on April 27 held a joint press conference in front of the Japanese embassy in Seoul in denunciation of the U.S.-Japan military tie-up.
					 The organizations in a press release lashed out at the U.S. and Japan for finally confirming the revision of the "U.S.-Japanese Defense Cooperation Guidelines" at the foreign minister and defense minister talks that day.
					
					 The bodies demanded the U.S. and Japan stop at once their attempt to put Northeast Asia under their military control.

articles.title: Scandals Rampant in S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Scandals Rampant in S. Korean Puppet Army
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- It has been disclosed that Ri Kyu Thae, chairman of the Ilgwang Group of south Korea, bribed members of the defense security department under the puppet Agency of Defense Affairs to obtain military secrets for trade, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 A member of the defense security department of the agency confessed that he received 500 000 won each time from the chairman of the Ilgwang Group and handed military secrets to him, receiving 10 million won in the past three years.
					
					 Ri obtained a lot of military secrets including the puppet army's plan for introducing weapons in touch with its brass hats.
					
					 The ceaseless disclosure of scandals in the puppet army proves that money-making in the upper echelon of the military has become a trend.

articles.title: Outbreak of Foot-and-Mouth Disease in South Chungchong Province, S. Korea
articles.content:
Outbreak of Foot-and-Mouth Disease in South Chungchong Province, S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean KBS, foot-and-mouth disease fatal to cattle broke out in a cattle farmer's household in Chonan City, South Chungchong Province on April 28.
					 This is the first time that such disease has ever broken out in the province since 2011.
					
					 Such disease broke out in Ansong and Richon, Kyonggi Province and Jechon, North Chungchong Province this year alone.

articles.title: 20DPRK's Important Days Marked in Equatorial Guinea, Thailand
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked in Equatorial Guinea, Thailand
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Receptions, photo exhibition and film shows took place in Equatorial Guinea and Thailand on April 9 and 10. They marked the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK and the third anniversaries of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venue of the photo exhibition were photos dealing with the exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The first deputy general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea said that all members of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and its supporters are highly praising the undying feats Kim Il Sung, eternal leader of the Korean people, performed for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.
					
					 These immortal feats are holding a brilliant position in the human history, he noted, adding:
					
					 We wish the party and people of the DPRK greater success in the efforts to build a thriving nation and reunify the country under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.
					
					 After watching the Korean film "Arms of Korea", the director of a Thailand company said that Kim Il Sung advanced the line of putting an end to the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea by force of arms and achieved the historic cause of national liberation by waging the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater achievements in all fields under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Equatorial Guinea.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Laud Korean People's Army
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Laud Korean People's Army
						
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army (KPA) is the only strong army in the world that defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on April 23.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) on April 25, 1932.
					
					 Under his guidance the KPRA defeated the Japanese imperialists and liberated Korea on August 15, 1945.
					
					 It developed into the KPA, the regular revolutionary armed forces, on February 8, 1948.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander, the heroic KPA inflicted defeat on the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in the Fatherland Liberation War to achieve historic victory.
					
					 The DPRK defeated the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, the first of its kind in history.
					
					 In the postwar period the KPA frustrated every move of the U.S. imperialists to provoke a new war.
					
					 The KPA is reliably defending the sovereignty and independence of the country and nation and firmly guaranteeing peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con secretario general de Union Interparlamentaria
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con secretario general de Union Interparlamentaria
						
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam departio el dia 30 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el secretario general de la Union Interparlamentaria, Martin Chungong y su comitiva que le hicieron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al rey de Holanda
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al rey de Holanda
						
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 30 un mensaje de felicitacion al rey de Holanda, Willem Alexander, con motivo del dia nacional de ese pais.
					El remitente desea al pueblo holandes el bienestar y prosperidad.

articles.title: Portavoz de cancilleria coreana critica disparate del premier japones
articles.content:
Portavoz de cancilleria coreana critica disparate del premier japones
						
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- En relacion con que el premier japones Abe intento de nuevo en encubrir los crimenes del pasado de su pais insultando a las victimas de esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio ayer a la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea la siguiente respuesta:
					En una reciente conferencia impartida durante su visita a EE.UU., el premier japones Abe uso en cuanto a las esclavas sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones la expresion de "victimas del trafico de seres humanos". 
					
					Y en una conferencia de prensa tergiverso tambien el problema de esclavitud sexual como resultado del trafico de seres humanos.
					
					Tales palabras de Abe constituyen un insulto insoportable a las victimas.
					
					Las ex esclavas sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones no son victimas del trafico de ese tipo sino del crimen de esclavitud sexual, cometido coercitiva y sistematicamente   por Japon militarista.
					
					Los tremendos crimenes de lesa humanidad cometidos por Japon durante su ocupacion sobre Corea y la Segunda Guerra Mundial son hechos historicos que no se puede ocultar ni disimular.
					
					Abe y otros elementos conservadores ultraderechistas del pais isla tratan de negar sus crimenes del pasado y eludir la responsabilidad con palabras astutamente hilvanadas, lo cual es un acto de canallas y psicopatas carentes de la moral y conciencia del ser humano.
					
					Revelaron la bajeza moral y el cinismo del pais isla las palabras de Abe que defendio los crimenes de lesa humanidad desoyendo la fuerte demanda de la sociedad internacional de que pidan disculpas y liquiden esos delitos como la esclavitud sexual.
					
					Esta vez, Abe dijo que su pais donara fondos a la ONU para la proteccion de derechos humanos de la mujer.
					
					Eso es tambien una actitud sucia que se burla de la humanidad regateando los sagrados DDHH con sumas miserables de dinero.
					
					No podran evitar la destruccion mas vergonzosa que su derrota sufrida en la guerra del pasado, si las autoridades japonesas siguen tratando de tapar su historia criminal del pasado y repetir tal antecedente.
					
					Al liberarse del anacronico modo de pensar, Abe y otras autoridades japonesas deben reconocer sinceramente todos sus crimenes, pedir disculpas e indemnizarlos consecuentemente escuchando la demanda de la sociedad internacional.

articles.title: Portavoz de IDP del MINREX critica intento de EE.UU. de introducir sistema antimisil en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz de IDP del MINREX critica intento de EE.UU. de introducir sistema antimisil en Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en los ultimos dias, Estados Unidos maniobra de todos modos para emplazar en el suelo surcoreano THAAD e introducir el Sur de Corea en el sistema antimisil auspiciado por si mismo bajo pretexto de la "amenaza" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores publico el dia 30 una declaracion como sigue:
					En la reunion de KIDD efectuada hace poco, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos decidieron fijar el plan de operacion de disuadir desde el punto de vista conjunto la "amenaza" de las armas nucleares y misiles balisticos de la RPDC y poner en funcionamiento el "comite de estrategia disuasiva" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea.
					
					El intento de EE.UU. de introducir THAAD en el Sur de Corea que seria primera disposicion en ultramar despues de su territorio principal estadounidense y la isla Guam, esta relacionado con sus maniobras del establecimiento del sistema antimisiles, parte importante de la estrategia de la dominacion sobre Asia-Pacifico.
					
					La intencion principal del imperio yanqui de colocar a toda costa THAAD en el Sur de Corea reside en disponer el radar de alta capacidad en esta zona, frente mas que Japon y detectar y interceptar mas rapidamente los movimientos de misiles de los  rivales competitivos de la region euroasiatica.
					
					Si EE.UU. emplaza THAAD en el Sur de Corea, las fuerzas disuasivas basadas en las fuerzas armadas estrategicas de los paises perifericos serian unilateralmente debilitadas y neutralizadas, asi que se destruira el equilibrio de disuasivo existente entre EE.UU. y los paises perifericos.
					
					En este caso, se produciran la desconfianza y conflicto entre los paises perifericos, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos que permitieron la disposicion. Entonces se crearan las irrecuperables consecuencias negativas y nuevo peligro en el ambiente de seguridad de la region.
					
					Al exagerarse la situacion regional, los titeres surcoreanos que estan atados a las subordinadas relaciones de "alianza" con EE.UU., se veran obligados a apoyarse mas en este imperio.
					
					Al fin y al cabo, EE.UU. acecha la oportunidad de controlar mas a los titeres fomentando la agravacion de relaciones entre los titeres surcoreanos y los paises perifericos, ademas de realizar el objetivo militar a traves de la disposicion de THAAD.
					
					Los paises perifericos advierten que la disposicion de THAAD en el Sur de Corea es igual a pasar la linea peligrosa y el Sur de Corea sera objeto de ataque nuclear de otros paises, lo cual refleja sus inquietudes y precauciones.
					
					Si THAAD se emplaza en el Sur de Corea, se aumentara aun mas el peligro de conflicto entre las potencias en el Noreste de Asia y su chispa caera tambien sobre nosotros, razon por la cual nos vemos obligados a fortalecer mas la capacidad militar para enfrentarse a ello.

articles.title: EE.UU. y titeres surcoreanos son autores de proliferacion nuclear, insiste CRPP
articles.content:
EE.UU. y titeres surcoreanos son autores de proliferacion nuclear, insiste CRPP
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Estados Unidos y la banda titere surcoreana concluyeron las negociaciones sobre la enmienda del "acuerdo de energia atomica" iniciadas desde 2010 y lo suscribieron provisionalmente.
					Tal enmienda posibilitara a los titeres surcoreanos hacer abiertamente el reprocesamiento de combustible nuclear usado y el enriquecimiento de uranio que hasta la fecha han venido realizandolos a puertas cerradas bajo el amparo de su amo gringo, y entregarse mas al desarrollo de armas nucleares.
					
					En su informacion no. 1092, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria califica la presente enmienda de una maniobra peligrosa y criminal que exacerba mas la aguda situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y acarrea la proliferacion y la carrera armamentista nucleares en el Nordeste Asiatico, y prosigue:
					
					Ya desde la decada de 1950, el imperio concerto con los titeres surcoreanos el enganoso "acuerdo de energia atomica" y tolero y promovio activamente el desarrollo de armas nucleares de los titeres bajo el vistoso rotulo de "control de armas nucleares".
					
					So pretexto del "tratado cientifico-tecnico", entrego sistematicamente al Sur de Corea las tecnicas destinadas al desarrollo de armas nucleares y hoy en dia le permite hacer el enriquecimiento de uranio y el reprocesamiento de combustible nuclear usado.
					
					Asi, EE.UU. puso al desnudo su naturaleza como autor de la proliferacion nuclear quitando hasta la mascara de haber ofrecido a los titeres surcoreanos en secreto y sistematicamente desde hace mucho tiempo las sensibles tecnicas, la mano de obra y los equipos necesarios al desarrollo de armas nucleares.
					
					Esos tipejos hablan cinicamente de la "preocupacion sobre proliferacion nuclear" cuestionando el "problema nuclear" de alguien.
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos ya no tienen la calificacion de cuestionar las armas nucleares de la RPDC y no pueden liberarse jamas de la responsabilidad como autor de proliferacion nuclear y la carrera armamentista nuclear.
					
					Frente al imprudente alboroto nuclear del imperio y los titeres surcoreanos, la RPDC intensificara mas su disuasivo nuclear de caracter autodefensivo, espada omnipotente de justicia, para defender la dignidad y la independencia de la nacion, la paz y la seguridad del mundo.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central por 125o aniversario del Primero de Mayo
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central por 125o aniversario del Primero de Mayo
						
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 30 en la Casa Central de Obreros el acto central dedicado al 125o aniversario del Primero de Mayo, Dia Internacional de los Trabajadores.
					A la ocasion asistieron Yang Hyong Sop, Ro Tu Chol, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los trabajadores capitalinos y los coreanos residentes en ultramar.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los delegados de las organizaciones internacionales, en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Yang Hyong Sop, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					Yang adelanto que el Primero de Mayo es la fiesta en que los trabajadores de la Corea del Songun refuerzan la solidaridad internacional con sus colegas de todo el mundo demostrando su impetu revolucionario y poderio combativo.
					
					Gracias a su gran lider y gran dirigente, los trabajadores coreanos pudieron cumplir con su noble mision historica y deber en la lucha por cumplir la causa de independencia, la socialista de las masas populares, recordo y continuo:
					
					Desde el principio de sus actividades revolucionarias, el Presidente Kim Il Sung presento a amplias masas trabajadoras como duenas de la revolucion bajo la bandera de la idea Juche y abrio la nueva epoca de la historia, la del Juche, en que verifica la independencia de las masas populares movilizando sus fuerzas inagotables.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il agrupo a las masas trabajadoras en torno al partido y condujo sabiamente la causa de independencia de las masas populares y la socialista por la unica senda de victorias con el poderio de unidad monolitica.
					
					La historia de la direccion sobre la revolucion de los grandes lideres la continua hoy el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Al confiar en los obreros, campesinos e intelectuales quienes apoyaron siempre con fidelidad al partido compartiendo el mismo destino con este, el Mariscal puso de pleno manifiesto las inagotables fuerzas espirituales y el fervor patriotico de ellos.
					
					Asi conduce sabiamente la campana para llevar a feliz termino el legado del Dirigente y la ofensiva general por construir un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					En los anales de la revolucion coreana estan registradas las proezas heroicas de los trabajadores que con el martillo, hoz y pluma lucharon por el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo en acato a la idea y direccion del gran lider y gran partido.
					
					Todos deben anticipar la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la direccion del Mariscal sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
